channel.title: Explain My Questions.. Dont Flame
channel.description:
[b][u]I now no my answers too my question's thanks too Ziplock[/u][/b] [b][u]I now no my answers too my question's thanks too Ziplock[/u][/b] [b][u]I now no my answers too my question's thanks too Ziplock[/u][/b]
[b]Okay this may be commen sense and not rocket science and please don't flame at me.[/b] [b][u]This was the only section i thought it would fit in [code]Help[/code] Sorry for wasting any moderators time if theyre going too lockit but i would just like too no about Rep++ ;)[/u][/b]
Rep++ How do i Rep++ someone and how do i gain the option to Rep++ Someone
[b]Ive just got a option too Rep++ someone and can you explain how i gained that option and what does it do and what isit for..[/b]
Sorry for the brainless questions don't be mad im new :confused: Feel free too call be brainless ;)

item.title: Explain My Questions.. Dont Flame
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

You get rep if someone clicks the “[rep++]” button under your name, and to get the option… It should always be there. You can start reping when you have 15 rep.

Read full topic

item.title: Explain My Questions.. Dont Flame
item.dc:creator: @Old_Dutch Old~Dutch
item.description:
@Old_Dutch wrote:

?.[quote=“The Soul, post:2, topic:263353”]This is server help, though you can by clicking the ‘[Rep++]’ button under the user’s name.[/quote]???
Could you explain how i get the option too rep++ some one and what i need too rep++ some one
Yes it may be server help but theyres no other sections sorry…

Could you answer my question would be appreciated.

Read full topic

item.title: Explain My Questions.. Dont Flame
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

This is server help, though you can by clicking the ‘[Rep++]’ button under the user’s name.

Read full topic
